'''Unbreakable''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[Data component format#unbreakable|{{cd|unbreakable}}]], a component preventing [[item]]s from consuming [[durability]].{{only|java}}
* [[Unbreaking]], an enchantment that allows items to sometimes not consume durability when they should.
* [[Indestructible]], the property that some [[block]]s (such as [[bedrock]]) have, making them unable to be destroyed by {{control|breaking}}.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
*{{DuEntityLink|Unbreakable One}}, an ancient redstone golem.

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
*{{LeEntityLink|The Unbreakable}}, a piglin boss.
